meanings.definition: A dental condition in which the lower teeth protrude beyond the upper teeth.
meanings.sent1: Her underbites made it difficult for her to chew properly.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended braces to correct her underbites.
meanings.sent3: The underbites in the cartoon character's smile added to his goofy appearance.
meanings.sent4: The underbites of the old house's foundation hinted at its unstable structure.
meanings.sent5: The underbites of the keys on the piano created a unique sound when played.

meanings.definition: The act of biting with the lower teeth in front of the upper teeth.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally bit his lip due to his underbites.
meanings.sent2: The dog's underbites made it challenging for it to pick up small objects.
meanings.sent3: The underbites in the comedy skit added a humorous touch to the scene.
meanings.sent4: Her underbites in negotiation always gave her the upper hand.
meanings.sent5: The underbites of the scissors made it easier to cut through thick paper.
